synopsis.text: Bong Gi once dreamed of success, but unemployment and loneliness have left him disillusioned. Overweight and friendless, he finds solace in gaming and ogling women online. His pathetic life takes an unbelievable turn when he wakes up one morning transformed into the very vision of feminine beauty he used to admire. Thrown into confusion, Bong Gi seeks help online and meets the charming Sae Mi. As they bond, Bong Gi starts developing feelings for her. However, he soon discovers a complicating truth - Sae Mi's brother is none other than Sang Woo, Bong Gi's former friend turned bullying tormentor. With humor and unexpected twists, "Bagel Girl" explores the fantasies and harsh realities of an outcast granted the power to rewrite their story. Will Bong Gi use his new lease on life to right past wrongs, or simply to indulge fleeting desires? This animated series promises laughs and surprises in its look at love, revenge and transformation.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
